entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
